dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4281032L] A Pirate Radio you baybe hosting!!!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Saturday, May 26, 2007 10:40 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4281032L] A Pirate Radio you baybe hosting!!! ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. A Pirate Radio you baybe hosting!!! Added by system at Saturday, May 26 2007 06:36 am X-MailFrom: steveboswell@fsmail.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sat May 26 06:35:59 2007 Received: (qmail 1078 invoked by alias); 26 May 2007 11:35:58 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 1070 invoked from network); 26 May 2007 11:35:58 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; Sat, 26 May 2007 06:35:10 -0500 Received: from smtp2.wanadoo.co.uk ([193.252.22.157] helo=smtp2.freeserve.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from steveboswell@fsmail.net) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HruY5-000ETm-UE for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 26 May 2007 06:35:06 -0500 Received: from me-wanadoo.net (localhost [127.0.0.1]) by mwinf3112.me.freeserve.com (SMTP Server) with ESMTP id 041325800085 for ; Sat, 26 May 2007 13:35:03 +0200 (CEST) Received: from wwinf3102 (wwinf3102 [172.22.158.29]) by mwinf3112.me.freeserve.com (SMTP Server) with ESMTP id EFB105800084 for ; Sat, 26 May 2007 13:35:02 +0200 (CEST) X-ME-UUID: 20070526113502981.EFB105800084@mwinf3112.me.freeserve.com From: Stephen Boswell Reply-To: steveboswell@fsmail.net To: abuse@theplanet.com Message-ID: <677029.694041180179302965.JavaMail.www@wwinf3102> Subject: A Pirate Radio you baybe hosting!!! MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_57980_2968770.1180179302964" X-Originating-IP: [81.149.86.254] X-Wum-Nature: EMAIL-NATURE X-WUM-FROM: |~| X-WUM-TO: |~| X-WUM-REPLYTO: |~| Date: Sat, 26 May 2007 13:35:02 +0200 (CEST) X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 May 2007 11:35:10.0677 (UTC) FILETIME=[EB15F850:01C79F89] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello I would like to report a pirate radio station which is holding a internet website at www.examplefm.net . They have been operating live radio over yesterday evening and should return today, The site streams live audio on a regular basis playing music they do not have the copyright permition for and alot of drug talkj is happening in the live shouts! I personally would like to see this website suspended from the domain as its inapropiate and I would'nt like any child to accidentaly tune into this material on radio! The site is also used to advertise there pirate radio on the fm radio band on 101.5 warrington uk! Please could you do something about this and thanks in advance! I WOULD LIKE TO BE KEPT ANNONIMOUSE PLEASE! MIME element (text/html)

Hello I would like to report a pirate radio station which is holding a internet website at www.examplefm.net  .   

They have been operating live radio over yesterday evening and should return today, The site streams live audio on a regular basis playing music they do not have the copyright permition for and alot of drug talkj is happening in the live shouts!   I personally would like to see this website suspended from the domain as its inapropiate and I would'nt like any child to accidentaly tune into this material on radio!  

The site is also used to advertise there pirate radio on the fm radio band on 101.5 warrington uk!

Please could you do something about this and thanks in advance!    I WOULD LIKE TO BE KEPT ANNONIMOUSE PLEASE!

MIME element (text/plain)
